mapper.insert: insert into rb_pushrecords (PushRecord_ID, PushRecord_UserID, PushRecord_PushID, PushRecord_PushUserID, PushRecord_TypeID, PushRecord_Title, PushRecord_Content, PushRecord_CreateTime, PushRecord_ModifyTime, PushRecord_Version, PushRecord_Status, PushRecord_Deleted ) values (#{pushrecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pushrecordUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pushrecordPushid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pushrecordPushuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pushrecordTypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pushrecordTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pushrecordContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.select:
select , ( SELECT User_Name FROM rb_user WHERE User_Id = PushRecord_UserID ) AS User_Name from rb_pushrecords
ORDER BY PushRecord_CreateTime DESC
mapper.update:

PushRecord_UserID = #{pushrecordUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

PushRecord_Status = #{pushrecordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PushRecord_Deleted = #{pushrecordDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PushRecord_Version = PushRecord_Version + 1
where PushRecord_ID = #{pushrecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
